title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 213.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 213.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to all ferrous jobbing foundry
cupolas and ferrous jobbing foundry open hearths in operation on or prior to
the effective date of this Part and to subsequent modifications but not to
production foundries or any new foundries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
213.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
